title: Linguaspan - Full-Stack Speech Transcription App
description: Built an AI-powered transcription platform for African-accented English, French, and Yoruba
Backend with FastAPI (Python), Supabase, Swagger docs, integrated with Hugging Face models
Frontend with Next.js, React, TypeScript and TailwindCSS
Secure user authentication, file upload capabilities, and role-based access management
Real-time transcription processing with advanced AI/ML model integration
alt: Linguaspan mobile app interface showing speech transcription features
details: Comprehensive AI-powered transcription platform supporting African-accented English, French, and Yoruba languages.
achievements: Developed backend with FastAPI (Python), Supabase, and Swagger docs
Created responsive Next.js, React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS frontend
Integrated Hugging Face AI/ML models for transcription
Implemented secure auth, file upload, and user role management

title: MoneSave / Orukka App
description: Complete UI/UX design and product development for MoneSave savings app (Orukka)

Redesigned and optimized 60% of onboarding and high-conversion screens
Platform integrations for seamless banking and financial services
Collaborated with cross-functional global teams for feature delivery and testing

details: Comprehensive savings and financial management mobile application with advanced UI/UX design.
achievements: Redesigned and optimized 60% of onboarding and high-conversion screens
Contributed to increases in revenue and user acquisition/retention
Integrated core product features and backend services using Supabase
Collaborated with cross-functional global teams for feature delivery

title: Palremit Internal Dashboard
description: Internal dashboard for Palremit financial app managing 7 user roles (super admin, admin, crm, etc.)
Frontend management for crypto and fiat transactions with comprehensive controls
User management system with role-based access and permissions
Ads management and cards administration functionality
Built for fintech operations with advanced dashboard features
alt: Palremit internal dashboard showing fintech management interface
details: Comprehensive internal dashboard developed for Palremit financial application. Manages 7 distinct user roles including super admin, admin, and CRM. Features frontend management for crypto and fiat transactions, user administration, ads management, and cards functionality.
achievements: Built internal dashboard managing 7 user roles for Palremit
Implemented frontend management for crypto and fiat transactions
Created comprehensive user management and role-based access
Developed ads management and cards administration features
Designed fintech dashboard with advanced operational controls

title: Teller Management System
description: Banking teller management system for Tier 2 financial institution in Nigeria
Transaction request and management system with comprehensive processing capabilities
Callover reporting and audit trail functionality for compliance and tracking
Security features implementation and performance optimization
Frontend built with React, TypeScript, HTML, and CSS for modern banking workflows
alt: The Alternative Bank teller management system interface showing transaction processing
details: Comprehensive teller management system developed for a Tier 2 financial institution in Nigeria. The system handles transaction requests, transaction management, callover reporting, audit trails, and includes robust security features with performance optimization.
achievements: Developed teller management system for Tier 2 banking institution
Implemented transaction request and management features
Created callover reporting and audit trail functionality
Enhanced security features and performance optimization
Built modern React/TypeScript frontend for banking workflows

title: HRIS Management System
description: Extended Human Resource Information System built as an evolution of Paytime payroll system
Comprehensive modules covering leave management, performance evaluation, teammate management
Advanced payroll system including all Paytime features with enhanced capabilities
End-to-end recruitment system with applicant tracking and hiring workflows
Converted Paytime codebase into 8 distinct subsections using Next.js, TypeScript, and React Query
Modern architecture with improved type safety, performance, and user experience
alt: HRIS management system dashboard showing employee management, payroll, and recruitment features
details: Comprehensive Human Resource Information System developed as an extended version of the Paytime payroll platform. Features 8 distinct modules covering leave management, performance evaluation, teammate management, advanced payroll processing, and end-to-end recruitment. Includes complete code migration from JavaScript to TypeScript with Next.js and React Query for enhanced performance and type safety.
achievements: Built comprehensive HRIS extending Paytime payroll system
Developed 8 distinct modules for leave, performance, teammate, and recruitment management
Migrated codebase to Next.js, TypeScript, and React Query architecture
Enhanced payroll system with advanced features and integrations
Improved system stability by 90% through code modernization
Created end-to-end recruitment and performance evaluation workflows

title: Paytime - Payroll Management System
description: Comprehensive payroll management system built with Django for employee compensation and benefits administration
User Authentication with bank account verification through Paystack integration
Role-based Access Control with department management and automated onboarding workflows
Payroll Processing with detailed payslips including allowances, deductions, and tax calculations
Pension Management with automated contributions, PFA remittances, and compliance reporting
Audit Trails with complete financial transaction tracking and professional PDF document generation
alt: Paytime payroll management system dashboard showing employee management and pension features
details: Paytime is a comprehensive payroll management system built with Django that streamlines employee compensation and benefits administration for organizations. The platform manages the complete employee lifecycle from onboarding and authentication to payroll processing and pension management.
achievements: Built comprehensive payroll system with Django and Python
Integrated Paystack for secure bank account verification
Implemented role-based access control and automated workflows
Developed pension management with automated PFA remittances
Created audit trails with professional PDF document generation
Increased HR and finance department productivity by 600%
